channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Netflix Stores 140 Million Hours of Viewing Data Per Day】Netflix如何每天存储1.4亿小时的查看数据
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll learn how Netflix tackled these problems and improved their storage system to handle millions of hours of viewing data every day.】在本文中，我们将了解Netflix如何解决这些问题并改善其存储系统，以每天处理数百万个小时的查看数据。

item.title: 【EP153: A Cheatsheet on Comparing Key-Value Stores】EP153：比较钥匙值商店的备忘单
item.description: 【We compare 15 key-value stores across different parameters like replication style, consistency protocol, node discovery approach, and partitioning approach.】我们比较了不同参数的15个键值存储，例如复制样式，一致性协议，节点发现方法和分区方法。

item.title: 【API Protocols 101: A Guide to Choose the Right One 】API协议101：选择合适的指南
item.description: 【An API protocol is a set of rules and standards that define how different software applications communicate over a network.】API协议是一组规则和标准，它定义了不同的软件应用程序如何通过网络通信。

item.title: 【Mastering Data Consistency Across Microservices】掌握微服务的数据一致性
item.description: 【Microservices architecture is a software design pattern where an application is built as a collection of small, independent services, each responsible for a specific function.】Microservices Architecture是一种软件设计模式，其中应用程序是作为小型独立服务集合构建的，每个服务都负责特定功能。

item.title: 【Dark Side of Distributed Systems: Latency and Partition Tolerance】分布式系统的阴暗面：延迟和分区耐受性
item.description: 【Distributed systems are collections of independent computing resources that work together to present a unified, cohesive service or application to the user.】分布式系统是独立计算资源的集合，它们共同起作用，向用户提供统一的，凝聚力的服务或应用程序。

item.title: 【EP154: What is MCP?】EP154：什么是MCP？
item.description: 【Why is everyone talking about it? Let’s take a closer look.】为什么每个人都在谈论它？让我们仔细看一下。

item.title: 【Facebook’s Database Handling Billions of Messages (Apache Cassandra® Deep Dive)】Facebook的数据库处理数十亿条消息（ApacheCassandra®深水潜水）
item.description: 【Cassandra is a powerful database system designed to store and manage massive amounts of data across many computers.】Cassandra是一个强大的数据库系统，旨在存储和管理许多计算机的大量数据。

item.title: 【Monolith vs Microservices vs Modular Monoliths: What's the Right Choice】Monolith vs微服务与模块化整体：正确的选择是什么
item.description: 【In the ever-evolving landscape of software development, the choice of architecture can make or break a project.】在不断发展的软件开发环境中，体系结构的选择可以制定或破坏项目。

item.title: 【EP152: 30 Free APIs for Developers】EP152：开发人员的30个免费API
item.description: 【APIs are the backbone of modern software development.】API是现代软件开发的骨干。

item.title: 【How Uber Built Odin to Handle 3.8 Million Containers】Uber如何建造Odin处理380万个容器
item.description: 【The details in this post have been derived from Uber Engineering Blog and other sources.】这篇文章中的详细信息来自Uber工程博客和其他来源。
